DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare overall fit AIR OPTIX® COLORS AIR OPTIX® AQUA contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lenses : AIR OPTIX® COLORS Versus AIR OPTIX® AQUA
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant randomize Visit 1 ( Screening ) receive 1 2 investigational product ( 1:1 assignment ) . Between Visit 1 Visit 2 , participant wear habitual AIR OPTIX® AQUA lenses . Investigational product dispense Visit 2 ( Baseline ) , participant ask return 2 additional visit : Visit 3 ( Day 14 ) Visit 4 ( Day 28 ) .
DOC.criteria: Visual acuity least 20/30 ( Snellen ) eye distance contact lenses best correct visual acuity ≥ 20/25 eye . Manifest cylinder less equal 0.75 diopter ( D ) ( within previous year ) eye . Successful wear AIR OPTIX® AQUA soft contact lenses eye past 3 month minimum 5 day per week 8 hour per day . Willing sign Informed Consent form . If legal age consent , legally authorize representative must also sign Informed Consent form . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular systemic medical condition may , opinion investigator , preclude safe administration test article affect result study . Wears habitual lens extend wear modality ( sleep lens overnight / removing lens daily basis ) . Monovision , monocular ( one eye functional vision ) , fit one lens . History intolerance hypersensitivity component test article . Use overthecounter ( OTC ) prescribe topical ocular medication within previous 7 day ( exclude rewetting drop ) . Moderate severe corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , injection , tarsal abnormality , `` '' complication , corneal infiltrates . Current history ocular infection , severe inflammation , disease within previous 6 month . Any systemic disease may affect eye exacerbate use contact lenses contact lens solution . Ocular intraocular surgery within previous 12 month ( exclude placement punctal plug ) . Use medication contribute dry eye ocular irritation unless stable dose regimen minimum 30 day prior study entry able remain stable regimen throughout study . Participation investigational clinical study within previous 30 day . Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
